snippet: The New York City Ballet’s program Tuesday night included two Balanchine works that embodied the extremes of dance: a showoff physicality and a meditative interior life.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews performance by the New York City Ballet at the David H Koch Theater.
lead_paragraph: The New York City Ballet’s program Tuesday night included two Balanchine works that embodied the extremes of dance: a showoff physicality and a meditative interior life.

headline.seo: New York City Ballet Performs Balanchine at Koch Theater
headline.main: The Robust Balanchine, Along With the Reflective
headline.print_headline: The Robust Balanchine, Along With the Reflective
